name: linear
description: Interact with your Linear workspace: read and create issues, update statuses, assign team members, and query projects and cycles. Lets agents triage bugs, create tasks from conversations, and keep your backlog up to date automatically.
author: makenotion

env_vars.label: Linear API Key
env_vars.description: Generate a personal API key in Linear under Settings → API → Personal API Keys.

setup_notes: Go to Linear Settings → API → Personal API Keys and create a new key. Give it the scopes your agent needs (read, write issues).
